titleStmt.title: An epistle to the Greeks, especially to those in and about Corinth and Athens with certain queries propounded to the priests and doctors, and all the rest of the members and officers belonging unto the two churches of Greeks and Romans, which is of concernment for the view of them all throughout the world / written in Egripo in the island of Negroponte by a servant of the Lord, J.P.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

titleStmt.title: An epistle to the Greeks, especially to those in and about Corinth and Athens with certain queries propounded to the priests and doctors, and all the rest of the members and officers belonging unto the two churches of Greeks and Romans, which is of concernment for the view of them all throughout the world / written in Egripo in the island of Negroponte by a servant of the Lord, J.P.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Perrot by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages stained with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
